events.title: Creative
events.details: Installing a security system on a listed building was always going to be a challenge, especially on the outside. To help the cameras blend in with the building we colour matched them and the speakers to the walls and the end result was a great success.

events.title: Intuitive
events.details: Having several different fobs and tags for their system was a source of inconvenience for one client, so we integrated everything into one simple to use fob that controlled the gates, garage doors and CCTV systems.
